replies.body:
SJOKZ! <3 It's an absolute honor having yourself and the other EU LCS casters compliment the Allstars event hosted in Melbourne, i think it adds a really exciting and entertaining factor and i hope you all enjoy your visit down under. My questions are; having worked at many levels of casting and involvement on the LoL scene, particulary the EU LCS and now being one of the best and most popular caster identities out there, what are your future short term and long term goals, in and outside of LoL, and have you ever toyed with the idea of spending a considerable amount of time, perhaps even a full season, casting in another region outside what is considered your home soil (EU), we'd glady have you here in OCE.
Finally have you been able to do much homework and study of the players, teams and regions competing in the International Wildcard Allstars event, and if so what are your predictions of what you think we can expect from them during the event, is there anyone you will be keeping a close watch on or looking forward to see play?
Thanking you, love your work, keep it up.

well i learnt from this that i should of just posted a really short question via twitter cause that's where all the questions were picked from, the length of my question here does not fit in a twitter tweet. live and learn, next time.
fancy a root?
Cmon Sjokz, give the poor lad a chance. He's probably a great guy
cheers mate, cmon OCE get behind me.
Best of luck bro, I hope its a top notch root.

Sjokz Senpai! When are you and Krepo getting Married?!? ;))
-Welcome to Oceania! 
-From ya Fans in NZ :)

That is sexist you pig. Stop objectifying her just because she is female. There are woman in this world - some of them under the age of 15 - being forced into arranged marriages and you joke about it? You're a pathetic piece of vile scum and i sincerely hope you rot in hell.

Yours truly

The feminist community
all the weaboos are downvoting this post because they can't detect sarcasm
People don't understand comedy when they see it. Hilarious/10 <3

do u think mustachr make me look fat be honesty
i just drop mine new single
its me
im single
Can you feel it coming in the air tonight, oh Lord, oh Lord

Herro Sjokz! Don't write me off as some weirdo because of my name (it does have a meaning) because ever since I started watching esports you have been the one caster that always stood out. Heck my friends probably get sick of how many times I yelled "ITZZZ SJOKZZ" at the worlds viewing party. 

I've watched so many interviews and the ways you conduct them are brilliant, you know exactly when to let the other person respond and the questions asked are never simple yes or no questions, but instead questions that trigger a deep and interesting conversation so that us (the audience) get a real grasp of the topic instead of a snipit that leaves everyone confused. Geez this is starting to sound really fanboy now, so I'm gonna ask you a question that I've been wanting to ask for ages.

I'm only 16 and I love the idea of adressing the world to help everyone understand a concept better so it has always been a dream of mine to present myself to the world.

**QUESTIONS**:When you first discovered your dream and decided that it was the path you were going to follow, how did you advance into the wonderous world your in today? it's obviously not a perfect world so what were the obstacles you had to adapt to and overcome on your way to the top?

P.S. Have you been to New Zealand? :p

Thanks for your time (even if you didn't answer mine) and for answering questions from our side of the globe
fucking LoL
you really want that skin dont you :/
K, to prove I'm not doing it for the skin if this is chosen for whatever reason I hereby announce to not give me the skin
Bullshit you want that skin
lmao yeah he wanted that skin.

Sjokz! You've been my favourite league of legends interviewer from the very beginning, It's great that you're doing this! My question is, how many hours do you put into preparing/practicing for an interview?
Your just looking for a root mate.
i concur, he's just hungry for a root. {{champion:57}}
ohh grow up -.-

Do you ever feel like a plastic bag?
Drifting through the wind, hoping to start again?
Do you use D for flash or F?
10/10 would bang

Dear Sjokz, I was wondering if you've had to deal (being a female) with any kind of sexism in both gaming and your career choice, and if so how have you overcome it? I now and then am targeted in games for being female, and I try my best to be witty and fend off such attitudes as best as I can, and many times other lovely League players will happily jump in and stand by me, but there are some days when it can really get you down.
I think it's great to see ladies in the world of League of Legends, and you're clearly a very great role model to many (regardless of who they are) - as I've noticed from many of the other responses and queries left here. Whether I get a reply or not, I just want to say, keep up the good work.
is that really you in those pictures?

Hello Eefji :) or as we say here in Australia, Good Day Mate. 
It's an absolute pleasure to welcome you to our beautiful land of wonderful cultures and hope you enjoy your time here at down under. 

You have acheived so much already such as being one of the best League Commentators, a professional gamer and being a pageant contestant (My god your beautiful :P). I know I have a dream of becoming a person who can influence the world as much as possible or if I can't, just have impact at the very least. Becoming a humanitarian is my dream and a personal goal.

I know you love to live in the moment and right now, you are living an absolute dream. You could "**pinch**" yourself or wake up everyday and still think it's surreal. But, my **question** here is, I know being a LoL presenter won't last forever, so do you have anymore goals you want to achieve or pathways you want to embark an adventure on? (As you have achieved so much in a little space of time) The world is your oyster. Thanks for reading and I hope all your dreams come true, no matter where life takes you. Love Aaron. {{summoner:31}} {{champion:1}}
Are you that desperate for a fucking skin? Jesus christ...

This guy is so desperate for the skin, it's unbelievable. What's the bet you aren't actually Australian? Because hardly anyone here says that you stereotypical lil shit. You're not fooling anyone bub, give it up.
VEGEMITE OR NUTELLA
this is the kind of questions i wanna see

Hey Sjokz, What is your favourite league of legends champ select out of these {{champion:432}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:67}}
I want to ask her what was the best moment of her career
When xPeke backdoored her ;)

If I recall correctly, she said her most favourite career moment or at least her favourite interview was when she interviewed Dyrus during Worlds because of his influence on the eSports scene and she was glad she could navigate through that interview without making it awkward or creating tension.
That's a cool question!
are the nudes real?

As a commentator, have you been subject to the same level of abuse as some of the reviewers affected by gamergate? Has it changed your opinion of league gamers (or gamers in general?) hearing about some of the other stories?
You obviously get a lot of "will you marry me" comments - do these affect you negatively in any way? Are there any sexist or misogynist behaviour you've experienced that's beyond reasonable?

Finally - can you please give us the phonetic spelling of your full name? You say it so fast it's hard to get it right ..... !
lol - Is that the real deficio????
ICYMI: Here's Sjokz answering your community questions during the live Q&A http://bit.ly/21ePS60
Hey Sjokz, what's the weirdest or dumbest pun Phreak has ever made?
As an interviewer do you think drama (such as a rude gesture or a retiring player) gives you more/better questions to ask OR makes an interview awkward?
When I am feeling naughty, I like to eat cereal at night time. Do you like to eat cereal at night? What do you do when feeling naughty?

If wou would be able to create the definitive champion choosing between the abilities of all champions (exemple Teemo's Q, W from Riven, etc...), which him/her would have? Passive plus 4 abs.

Thanks!!
**Hey Sjokz, tell me, what makes a good shout caster. It is my dream to one day be a caster (I really want to be playing but if all else fail, shoutcasting is nice).** {{champion:17}} :D :D :D
